title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Project Learning Program for Enhancing Police Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Scenario-based learning environment design based on real police cases.

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategies to manage cognitive load in complex field situations, enabling judgment and response with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze real police work scenarios through project-based assignments and propose effective response strategies at least three times.
Learners can improve task communication efficiency by 20% by applying CLT-based learning strategies in teamwork-based simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
